[/nectar_highlighted_text][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”h3″ text_color=”#0075ff” line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”left” mobile_content_alignment=”inherit” link_target=”_self” text_content=”Helsinki is a place like no other. font_size_desktop=”25px” font_line_height=”1.2″]A good life in the city shouldn’t be just urban hustle and bustle. It’s something that should make you feel alive – it’s plunging into an ice hole after work or deciding to head to a spontaneous rave rumbling in the darkness. It’s then recovering from a hangover the next day by walking along endless strips of seashore.

But really, this life is for living. And this life is for you, in Helsinki.

Find out why it should be yours: MyHelsinki.fi[/nectar_responsive_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle”
